metadata.title: CVE-2024-0755 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 121, Firefox ESR 115.6, andThunderbird 115.6. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 122,Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
